RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: WE SEEK TO MAKE A COMPELLING DIFFERENCE IN THE LIVES OF ADULTS WITH ADVANCED MULTIPLE SCLEROSIS AND OTHER PROGRESSIVE NEUROLOGICAL CONDITIONS.
ASPIRES TO MAKE LIFE EASIER FOR THOSE WITH SPINA BIFIDA AND ACCESSIBILITY AND MOBILITY CHALLENGES.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: STUDENTS RUN AMERICA DBA STUDENTS RUN LA

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GRANTEE ORGANIZATIONS REGULARLY REPORT BACK TO ORGANIZATION ON THE RESULTS OF THEIR RESEARCH ACTIVITIES.
THIS 990 IS BEING PREPARED WITH THE BEST AVAILABLE INFORMATION AT THE TIME. UPON COMPLETION OF THE AUDIT, IF THERE ARE ANY SIGNIFICANT CHANGES, APPROPRIATE ACTION WILL BE TAKEN.
